articles.title: England vs. Spain: What to know, how to watch and stream UEFA Euro 2024 final - USA TODAY
articles.description: As England seeks redemption, Spain eyes history when the two European soccer powerhouses meet in the UEFA Euro 2024 final in Berlin.
articles.content:
One side will be seeking redemption.
The other will be vying for a place in history.
This is just the second time that England has reached the final of the Euro. Its previous final appearance was a… [+4705 chars]
